info.title: OFBiz REST APIs
info.description: Open API specification for OFBiz RESTful APIs.

tags.name: Exported Services
tags.description: OFBiz services that are exposed via REST interface with export attribute set to true

get.summary: Finds productId(s) corresponding to a product reference, productId or a GoodIdentification idValue
get.description: Finds productId(s) corresponding to a product reference, productId or a GoodIdentification idValue

200.description: Success response for the API call.

400.description: Bad Request: Due to malformed request syntax or invalid request message framing or incorrect request parameters.

example.errorDescription: The following required parameter is missing: [IN] [createProduct.internalName]
example.errorMessage: createProduct validation failed. The request contained invalid information and could not be processed.

422.description: Unprocessable Entity: Error indicating semantical errors. Request is syntactically correct though.

example.errorDescription: StandardException: A truncation error was encountered trying to shrink CHAR 'string' to length 1.
example.errorMessage: createProduct execution failed. The request contained invalid information and could not be processed.

401.description: Unauthorized: Access is denied due to invalid or absent Authorization header.

example.errorMessage: Unauthorized: Access is denied due to invalid or absent Authorization header.

403.description: Forbidden: Insufficient rights to perform this API call.

example.errorMessage: Forbidden: Insufficient rights to perform this API call.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Service called with HTTP method other than the declared one.

example.errorMessage: HTTP POST is not allowed on service 'demoDoGetService'.
